title: Point 1 A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and sample responses or to score the response.

Note: Some answers provided below may have acceptable variants. Teachers should use their discretion in accepting alternative answers.
descriptions:

Question A: Name the recipient of this letter from Pliny the Younger.

The correct response is:

  • Tacitus
